Answers.MP Summary: Wi-Fi Protected Access client and IEEE 802.1X supplicant

Explanations about Options.-e:
entropy file
 File for wpa_supplicant to use to maintain its internal entropy store in over
 restarts.
Explanations about Options.-D:
Driver to use (can be multiple drivers: nl80211,wext). (Per interface, see the
 available options below.)
Explanations about Options.-i:
Interface to listen on. Multiple instances of this option can be present, one per
 interface, separated by -N option (see below).

au_812592: sudo apt install smbclient

smbclient -L your-public-ip-address

Explanations about Options.-L:
This option allows you to look at what services are available on a server. You use it
 as smbclient -L host and a list should appear. The -I option may be useful if your
 NetBIOS names don't match your TCP/IP DNS host names or if you are trying to reach a
 host on another network.
